articles.title: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 Super
articles.excerpt: New leaks suggest NVIDIA is preparing to launch an even more powerful variant of its flagship GPU.
articles.content: Recent leaks from reliable sources suggest that NVIDIA is gearing up to launch a Super variant of its flagship RTX 4090 graphics card in early 2024...

articles.title: AMD Ryzen 9 9900X
articles.excerpt: AMD's next-generation Ryzen processors could bring significant IPC improvements and higher core counts.
articles.content: According to industry insiders, AMD's upcoming Ryzen 9 9900X is set to feature a new core architecture with substantial IPC gains and potentially up to 24 cores for mainstream desktop platforms...

articles.title: Samsung 990 PRO 4TB
articles.excerpt: Samsung's latest NVMe SSD offers unprecedented speeds and improved power efficiency.
articles.content: The Samsung 990 PRO represents the pinnacle of consumer-grade storage technology, offering sequential read speeds of up to 7,450 MB/s and write speeds of 6,900 MB/s...
